plan: In the initial rounds, I will bid slightly below my value to gauge others' strategies, risking losing but gathering data. Mid-game, I'll test aggressive overbidding by $5-$10 to assess opponents' reactions and potential for higher profits. In later rounds, I'll adapt based on observed patterns, potentially aligning closer to my value if opponents bid conservatively. I'll occasionally underbid substantially to explore if others consistently overbid, aiming to exploit predictable behaviors. Throughout, I'll track the success of each approach, adjusting my strategy to maximize profit while considering risk and opponent behavior.
